long description: Unlimited Local/STD calls, Unlimited Roaming Calls -- 6 GB 2G/3G/4G data -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 250 mins in a day or 1000 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Unlimited Local/STD calls, Unlimited Roaming Calls -- 6 GB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will 1.5GB/ Day ) -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 250 mins in a day or 1000 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity
Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data)
Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 200 MB 2G/3G/4G data)
